songs.title: I’ll Be Home For Christmas
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
I'll be home for Christmas
You can count on me
Please have snow and mistletoe
And presents under tree

[Chorus]
Christmas Eve will find me
Where the love light gleams
I'll be home for Christmas
If only in my dreams

[Instrumental break]

[Chorus]

[Outro]
If only in my dreams
